uv.gloss: radiation lying in the ultraviolet range

uvularia.gloss: genus of perennial rhizomatous herb of southern and southeastern United States

uvularia grandiflora.gloss: plant of southern and southeastern United States grown for its yellow flowers that can be dried

uvulariaceae.gloss: one of many subfamilies into which some classification systems subdivide the Liliaceae

uvulopalatopharyngoplasty.gloss: surgical resection of unnecessary palatal and oropharyngeal tissue to open the airway

uveal.gloss: of or relating to the uvea of the eye

uveous.gloss: of or relating to the uvea of the eye
